course.subject: ELEC
course.name: Hi-Tech Entrepreneurship
course.description: The course is intended to address different needs of engineers in operating and managing engineering business. Different topics will be covered in different semesters by experienced faculty members who have extensive working experience. Through the class, the students can acquire a sense on how to bridge their engineering training with the operation in the commercial world from the Engineering perspective. Students must obtain prior consent form the course instructor for enrollment.
